turns.speaker: user

turns.utterance: The Hampton Inn & Suites Chicago Downtown includes free Wi-Fi, a fitness center, and yes, complimentary hot breakfast. The rooms have a mini-fridge and a coffee maker. It's also a short walk to many of the shops and restaurants on the Magnificent Mile.

turns.speaker: user
